title: Looking For Bronze Players To Climb With
body:
Hey all,

I finished Silver 5 last season, and like a lot of you who were Silver last season, ended up back in bronze.
I'm looking for a group of good players who are looking to climb back up into Silver, and potentially hit gold.
You need to be able to win lane,cs well, know how to team fight, and have voice comms. (Curse Voice pref)
Comment below or hit me up in game if interested :)

replies.body:
Hi

I'm part of a clan that that has a NA team but I am trying to get a OCE one up and running, if you are interested feel free to come on to TS and have a chat and we can go from there.
TS Server:
ts.dmg-inc.com
